Author: justcallmeamess
Text: I had a similar experience when I first left home. My parents weren’t abusive but due to their own problems weren’t able to be supportive. When I got out on my own the freedom gave me a brief high and I felt better than ever. But I never stopped to heal from my past and it got bad, and  it’s taken me years to begin recovering myself to a state where I can start really processing my emotions and being healthy. Take advantage of your resources as a student. There is usually free counseling and support groups at colleges. Please don’t wait! You deserve to be 100% healthy and content.
